bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8 AM, Recess is from 10 to 10:20. Grades K to 3 have lunch at 11:35 to 12:20 PM and dismissal at 2:05 PM and grades 4 and 5 have lunch at 11:50 to 12:35 PM and dismissal at 2:35 PM
bell_schedule.2: Tuesday is early release day. School starts at 8 AM, Recess is from 10 to 10:20. Grades K to 3 have lunch at 11:35 to 12:20 PM. Grades 4 and 5 have lunch at 11:50 to 12:35 PM. All students are dismissed at 1:30PM
bell_schedule.3: School starts at 8 AM, Recess is from 10 to 10:20. Grades K to 3 have lunch at 11:35 to 12:20 PM and dismissal at 2:05 PM and grades 4 and 5 have lunch at 11:50 to 12:35 PM and dismissal at 2:35 PM
bell_schedule.4: School starts at 8 AM, Recess is from 10 to 10:20. Grades K to 3 have lunch at 11:35 to 12:20 PM and dismissal at 2:05 PM and grades 4 and 5 have lunch at 11:50 to 12:35 PM and dismissal at 2:35 PM
bell_schedule.5: School starts at 8 AM, Recess is from 10 to 10:20. Grades K to 3 have lunch at 11:35 to 12:20 PM and dismissal at 2:05 PM and grades 4 and 5 have lunch at 11:50 to 12:35 PM and dismissal at 2:35 PM

end_time.1: Grades K to 3 are dismissed at 2:05 PM and grades 4 and 5 are dismissal at 2:35 PM
end_time.2: Tuesday is early release day. All grades are dismissed at 1:30PM
end_time.3: Grades K to 3 are dismissed at 2:05 PM and grades 4 and 5 are dismissal at 2:35 PM
